name: beowulf-s-data
title: beowulf-s Data
description: Metadata and data derived from beowulf-s. The Beowulf-s project presents <em>The Translations of Beowulf: A Critical Bibliography</em> 1903 as a digital collection to explore the texts and Tinker's criticism.
